Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appAvailabilityV2

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appAvailabilityV2#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appAvailabilityV2
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appAvailabilityV2#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required)
